name: Hell To Heaven (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Hell To Heaven (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
<< Use fullscreen button in lower right! >>

 by Larissa Flores, Darcelis Gutierrez, Nicole Nunez, Wynta Carter

Hell to Heaven is an intense co-op building game where you either play as Dina, an angel that has fallen from Heaven and is trying to return there, or Zaada a demon girl that decides to aid Dina on her journey with the condition that she must become an angel if they succeed. You must attempt to build structures as fast as possible in order to fulfill your goal and return Dina to Heaven where she belongs!

CONTROLS:

DINA
MOVE: A D
JUMP: W
ACTION: S

ZAADA
MOVE: Left and right arrow keys
JUMP: Up arrow key 
ACTION: Down arrow key
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
